scripts.build: git config --global core.quotePath false && hugo --gc --minify --cleanDestinationDir && ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js build
scripts.ipfs-deploy: ./node_modules/ipfs-deploy/bin/ipfs-deploy.js -p pinata public -u pinata -d cloudflare -C -O | ./node_modules/@triplespeeder/ens-updater/bin/ens-updater.js setContenthash ${ENS_NAME} ipfs-ns stdin --web3 https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/${INFURA_KEY}
